title: Poppy -- The Dirty Ditch Digging Dingo
description: Best selling author, Vicky Kaseorg's whimsical story of a rescue dog, Poppy, and her indomitable spirit. Poppy secures the love of her "forever human", and then sets about revealing her true nature...digging...instilled in her by the Great HoundDog in the sky. Based on a true story, the antics of the irrepressible Poppy teach gentle lessons of following one's destiny with determination and delight. A book for all those who have ever been loved by a headstrong dog.
author: Vicky Kaseorg
